author: Joe Lorio
title: Something, Something, Something Dark Truck: This Is the Ram Rebel Black
text:
-The call of the dark side is powerful, especially for automakers drawn to the sinister appeal of blackout trim packages. Ram is the latest brand to fall under its spell, announcing a dark-themed appearance package for its 1500 Rebel, the Rebel Black. 
- 
-The Rebel Black displays its allegiance to the dark side with black wheels, a black brush bar, and a black interior (with available leather) that features black anodized trim, gray contrast stitching, and heavy-duty floor mats. Although it’s shown here painted black, all the other Rebel colors (silver, white, gray, and red) are available. The crew-cab-only Rebel Black can be had with a 3.6-liter Pentastar V-6 or a 5.7-liter Hemi V-8 providing the motive force. The starting price is $46,910.

-When it comes to blackness and the Ram Rebel, more is definitely more.
